text: Oleanna (anglicized from Oleana) is: * Oleana, a community in Ole Bull's colony in New Norway, Pennsylvania * Oleana, a character from Pokémon Sword and Shield * Oleana (clothing), a Norwegian textile company named after Ole Bull's Oleana community * "Oleanna" (song), a folk song mocking Ole Bull's ambitions of a perfect community * Oleanna (play), a play named after the folk song, written by David Mamet * Oleanna (film), a film based on Mamet's play, directed by the author and starring William H. Macy
title: Oleanna
